column1: Example of a Easy Read Material:
An advent calendar is a special calendar used to count the days of Advent in anticipation of Christmas.
It helps count down the days until Christmas.
Starting from December 1st to December 24th which is the day before Christmas
you open one door each day.
Behind each door there's a small gift or a piece of chocolate.
This way you receive a little surprise each day while waiting for Christmas.
It refers to the period of waiting for the birth of Jesus Christ.
People use Advent calendars to make the wait for Christmas more exciting and fun.
It's like a daily countdown to Christmas Day.
